sec.p: Using the production approach, a nationwide maximum figure of 2.9 MtC year −1 for the HWP carbon storage effect is determined for 2030. The maximum nationwide material substitution effect is 2.9 MtC year −1 in 2050. For the energy substitution effect, a nationwide maximum projection of 4.3 MtC year −1 in 2050 is established, with at least 50 % of this figure derived from east and west Japan, where a large volume of logging residue is generated. For the overall climate change mitigation effect, a nationwide maximum projection of 8.4 MtC year −1 in 2050 is established, equivalent to 2.4 % of Japan’s current carbon dioxide emissions.
